1.title: Small Town Secrets
1.plot: The case of 33-year-old married mother-of-two, Barbara Mendez, who was savagely beaten to death at her place of work in Oneida County, Wisconsin in 1982.

2.title: The Professor's End
2.plot: Kelly and Tonya Rider investigate the strange death of a retired college professor in Tonya's home town, whose cremation was halted by an anonymous tip call hinting at murder; an autopsy proves the tipster's information is accurate.

3.title: Holding Onto Hope
3.plot: Kelly and Johnny Bonds return to their home state of Texas to look into the disappearance of a young mother in 2000, whose family has never given up on her; while some suspect murder, others claim to have seen her on the run with a mystery man.

4.title: Down by the Lake
4.plot: Kelly and Steve Spingola investigate the brutal slaying of beloved mother Eloise Payne, who was stabbed 38 times in her Michigan home; a mysterious car spotted in the area may hold the key to identifying her killer.

5.title: Danger at Dawn

6.title: Preacher's Mother
6.plot: Kelly and Steve Spingola investigate the brutal slaying of mother Eloise Payne, who was stabbed thirty-eight times in her Michigan home. A mysterious car spotted in the area may hold the key to identifying her killer.

7.title: No Safe Return
7.plot:

8.title: Bound and Burnt

9.title: Pain In Pawhuska
9.plot: Kelly and Steve Spingola investigate the brutal slaying of an Oklahoma teenager whose night of cruising and partying turned deadly. Could a scandalous town rumor have led to her death? The team searches for justice 22 years later.

10.title: The Case Behind the Billboards

1.title: Small Town Suicide?
1.plot: Siegler and McClary travel to Cuero, TX., as they look to reopen a 2001 cold case and hope to discover if Pam Shelly was killed or if she committed suicide.

2.title: Mother
2.plot: Siegler and McClary travel to Morehouse Parish, La., as they look to reopen a 2006 cold case and hope to discover new clues that help solve the murder of an active church member in the community.

3.title: Home Town Hero
3.plot: Siegler and McClary head to Kelly's hometown of Blessing in Matagorda County, Texas, to investigate the murder of 48-year-old widow Charlene Corporon, who was shot to death in her own home in 1982.

4.title: Hit and Run
4.plot: Siegler and McClary travel to Globe, Ariz., to search for clues about an apparent 1988 hit-and-run that may have been the result of a teenage dispute.

5.title: Hiding in Plain Sight
5.plot: Siegler and McClary head to Dickson County, Tenn., to look for new clues that may help solve the 1998 murder of a likeable grocery store owner.

6.title: Small Town Tragedy
6.plot: The case of Mary Anne Holmes, a 29-year-old mother-of-two who was sexually assaulted and murdered in her own her own home in Thatcher, Arizona in 1995.

7.title: Hatchet
7.plot: Siegler and McClary travel to Sandusky County, Ohio, to search for new information that may help solve the 1988 murder of a 49-year-old mother of six, who was killed with a hatchet.

8.title: Blind Love
8.plot: The case of Rocky Bryant, a 54-year-old fertilizer plant worker who was brutally beaten to death at his workplace in Seagraves, Texas in 2008.

1.title: Gone
1.plot: The case of Tracy Allen, a 27-year-old mother-of-two who disappeared in Altus, Oklahoma in 2001, and whose whereabouts remain unknown.

2.title: A Monster Among Us
2.plot: The case of 78-year-old Willie Louise Kellum who was strangled to death in her own home in Camp Hill, Alabama in 2005.

3.title: High School Sweethearts
3.plot: The double murder case of Charles and Kathy Hayes who were beaten to death with a claw hammer in their own home in La Porte, Texas in 1997.

4.title: First Love
4.plot: The case of 17-year-old Marisol Gonzales and her unborn son who were shot to death in an alleyway in Cottonwood, Arizona in 1997.

5.title: He Said, He Said
5.plot: The case of 19-year-old Erika Case who was stabbed to death in Terre Haute, Indiana in 1998.

6.title: Ambush
6.plot: KElly and Yolanda investigate an Arkansas case of a couple how were shot execution style. A suspect emerges who had a disturbing history with the victms.

7.title: Single Working Mom
7.plot: The case of 27-year-old single mother Lydia Gutierrez who was suffocated and stabbed to death in her own home in Gallatin, Tennessee in 2010.

8.title: Billy Goat Hill
8.plot: The case of Victoria Carr Hollingsworth, whose skeletal remains were discovered in a secluded wooded area called Billy Goat Hill in Chattanooga, Tennessee in 1999.

9.title: Lady in the Box
9.plot: The case of Carolyn Jansen, whose decomposing corpse was found in a plastic container in Aurora, Colorado in 2005, three years after she had disappeared.

10.title: Copper Dollar Ranch
10.plot: The double murder case of Steven Fisher and Melisa Gregory, who were found beaten to death at Copper Dollar Ranch in Newton, Iowa in 1983.

11.title: Stranded
11.plot: The 1988 Bay City, Texas. Murder Case of Alma Henderson.

12.title: Death by Design
12.plot: The case of Diann Jean Hoelscher, whose skeletal remains were found in Waller County, Texas in 1997, eleven years after she went missing.

13.title: Kirby's Speed Shop
13.plot: The case of Kirby Smith, who was shot to death in Columbus, Georgia in 2004.

14.title: Justice Served
14.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

15.title: Sunspot Highway
15.plot: Pete Mullins is suspected of killing Margie Pointer. What happened to Pete's RV? Has anyone found it and searched it for evidence?

16.title: Other Side of the Tracks
16.plot: The case of Robin Stone, a 17-year-old pregnant teenager whose skeletal remains were discovered by hunters near Luburgh Lake in Guernsey County, Ohio in 1991.

17.title: Second Thoughts
17.plot: The case of Alma Noffsinger, who was found beaten to death in her home in Oakwood Village, Ohio in 1981.

18.title: Fool Me Once, Fool Me Twice?
18.plot: The case of 23-year-old Kathy Dean Taylor who was electrocuted in her bathtub with an electric clock radio in Vigo County, Indiana in 1975.

1.title: Still of the Night
1.plot: The case of 25-year-old Nori Jones who was stabbed to death in her own bedroom in Pocatello, Idaho in 2004.

2.title: Miss Congeniality
2.plot: Kelly and Yolanda investigate the murder of a young mother found shot to death in her car. (Yakima, WA)

3.title: Burned
3.plot: In October 2007, Fairview Park, Ohio, emergency crews were called by neighbors to 67-year-old Gwen Bewley's house. She was found dead in her burned-out kitchen.

4.title: Mother Daughter Tragedy
4.plot: Kelly and Yolanda look for a suspect in the 1993 strangulation murders of a 29-year-old mother and her 6-year-old daughter in Fort Wayne, Indiana.

5.title: Operator, Hurry!
5.plot: Kelly and Yolanda investigate the cold case of Nancy Jo Canode, brutally stabbed to death in her Florida home in 1981.

6.title: The Record Keeper
6.plot: A 67-year-old man was found murdered in his home in Bridgeport, West Virginia. Kelly and Yolanda discover that he may be his own best witness, having kept a detailed diary recording his daily life and interactions.

7.title: Little League Dad
7.plot: Early one morning in October 2009, Paul Bowman was found dead in bed from blunt force trauma to his head. Arlington, Texas police found the house in disarray, as in a robbery, but nothing valuable was missing.

8.title: American Dream
8.plot: Rupinder Goraya, her husband Kultar, and their two-year-old son Devyn came to Fort Myers, Florida, from India on a work permit. After developing a cancerous mass and taking a leave from work, she disappeared.

9.title: The Alley
9.plot: A popular young man is found murdered in a Florida alley, leading Kelly and Yolanda's team to start piecing together an intricate puddle of a crime.

10.title: Devoted
10.plot: In 2011, Marie Carlson, a beautiful, young bipolar mother, of 2 has disappeared. A group text was received from her to say she had to get away. She has not been seen or heard from since. There seems to be only 2 suspects, the local Pastor and his wife for whom, Marie had been a surrogate for after giving birth a few months earlier.

11.title: Lying in Wait
11.plot: Greenville, Ohio, Dennis Young and Kim Stephan were found shot dead inside Young's home. Stephan's ex-husband Bob and a woman named Patty Burton are the main suspects in the case.

12.title: Trip to Nowhere
12.plot: Hernando County, Florida, in 1981, a daughter returns home from school to find her mother, Laverne Mackey, gone without explanation. The investigators conclude she was murdered and that her husband, Merl Mackey, is the only suspect.

13.title: Justice Served
13.plot: John Walsh interviews the investigative team for their behind-the-scenes insights. Exclusive updates on past cases and questions to Kelly and Yolanda will be featured.

14.title: Beloved Doctor
14.plot: Paducah, Kentucky, Dr. Frank Shemwell, is brutally murdered and set on fire in his kitchen. Suspects include Dr. Shemwell's younger wife (Penny), her son, and her lover.

15.title: Smoking Gun
15.plot: Stacy Dillon, is killed in his hometown of Cleveland, Tennessee. The investigative team is able to narrow the suspect list down to one - Stacy's boyfriend, Robert Houston III.

16.title: The Good Life
16.plot: West Palm Beach, Florida, Gwen Greenblatt is cornered in her apartment and shot twice. It seems her abusive husband (Matt Greenblatt) is the murderer, but first, investigators must find who left a smoldering cigarette outside her apartment.

17.title: Off the Beaten Path (Spartanburg, SC)
17.plot: Eric and Dottie Ferguson were shot multiple times inside their rural Spartanburg, SC home. The team decides that a random intruder is incredibly unlikely, due to how remote the home was.

18.title: Room #10 (Fort Myers, FL)
18.plot: Fort Myers, Florida, A 22-year-old murder case of a woman found shot in the head, covered in bloody sheets and dumped behind a community recreation center.

19.title: The Escape (Oregon County, MO)
19.plot: With no body to prove a crime was committed, the investigators try to five or if a young mother who disappeared was killed or went into hiding.

20.title: Up in Flames (Johnson County, IA)
20.plot: Johnson County, IA to work with the sheriff's office on the 1995 case of a mother and gifted artist (Sue Kersten) who was found dead in her car after an explosion. Her husband's (Steve Klein) violent characteristics come to light.

21.title: Trajectory
21.plot: Ben Cooper is found dead of an apparent suicide by his wife, Samantha Price. Because of the location of the gun shot to the back of Ben's head, the team focuses on building a case against Samantha.

22.title: Justice Served
22.plot: John Walsh hosts a review of select "Cold Justice", with the input of the cast and relatives.

23.title: In the Neighborhood: Part 1
23.plot: White Settlement, Texas, Laura Walsh was sexually assaulted and stabbed to death in her home. Months later, two men, Gene Giddens and Jonathan "Keith" Durington, have their throats slashed. All 3 victims were set on fire after their deaths.

24.title: In the Neighborhood Part 2
24.plot: The White Settlement, Texas, investigation continues. After interviewing a large number of suspects, the team seems to be getting nowhere, until a recorded phone call of Doughlas Wright changes the outlook of the investigation.

1.title: One of Our Own
1.plot: The case of 35-year-old Mary Jane LeFlore, a Texas Department of Criminal Justice employee whose skeletal remains were found in Huntsville, Texas in 1991, two years after her disappearance.

2.title: Fresh Wounds
2.plot: The missing persons case of Morten K. Aigeltinger, a 56 year-old professional photographer who disappeared in Jefferson County, West Virginia in 2015.

3.title: A Deadly Inheritance
3.plot: The case of 56 year-old Glenn W. Pennie, who disappeared from Polk County, Oregon on his way to attend a settlement meeting about his late-father's estate in 2004.

4.title: Beyond the Grave
4.plot: The case of 22-year-old George Tyrone "Tye" Breland, who was found by his wife, Kathie, lying on the floor of their bedroom with a fatal gunshot wound to his chest in Pascagoula, Mississippi in 1975.

5.title: Home Alone
5.plot: The case of 24-year-old Chrystal Pree West, a loving mother who was brutally murdered in her own home in Hope, Arkansas in 2003.

6.title: The Widow
6.plot: The case of 76-year-old Cora Campbell, a recently widowed pensioner who was brutally stabbed to death in her own home in Rock Hill, South Carolina in 2012.

7.title: If I Can't Have You No One Can
7.plot: The case of Tanai Jones, a 21-year-old college student who was stabbed and shot to death in Paterson, New Jersey in 2000.

8.title: Cabin in the Woods
8.plot: The case of 43-year-old Eugene A. Monte who was found shot to death in his cabin in the small village of Hannibal located in Taylor County, Wisconsin in 1999.

9.title: Dying Decalaration
9.plot: The case of 46-year-old mother and widow Ida Anita Houston, who was gunned down on her own doorstep in Flint, Michigan in 1991.

10.title: Covet
10.plot: The case of 30-year-old Jeff Veazea who was murdered in his car after attending church on Palm Sunday in Lake Charles, Louisiana in 2002.

-1.title: Devoted: Revisted
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.title: Cold Justice
plot: Reality series following former prosecutor Kelly Siegler and crime scene investigator Yolanda McClary as they crack cold cases across the U.S.::Anonymous
